channel.title: Tip for a little extra free gas at the pump
channel.description:
Ok, this will be a short little trick that I use at the pump for some extra free gas, its not a lot but hell who doesnt mind some extra gas.
1. First get a full tank then top it off (or whenever your done pumping) 2. Next pull the release trigger very slightly just untill you here or feel a very small click in the trigger 3. Next tilt the gas hose 90 degrees vertically toward the sun 4. then tilt the nozzle as well
Now this will release the gas held in the hose, its kinda like purging the hose, it works pretty well and it will give you a little extra umph when you want it =)
GL, Airforce525

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, I always did this when I was using my bike.

That little bit extra really helps on something with such a small tank, especially considering the 60cc I had was doing like 100mpg or some shit

item.title: Tip for a little extra free gas at the pump
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Niall:

Another tip is to fill up on a bloody freezing morning, as fuel is more denser when it’s cold.

More denser =p
